channel.title: Support Verizon and AT&T with roaming SIM
channel.description:
Hi,
We have been using Hologram Sims (supports roaming on AT&T and Verizon in US) and I was wondering if the WP7700 can support Verizon and AT&T with the same part/firmware? This way the modem can simply choose the strongest signal.
Thanks, Cliff

item.title: Support Verizon and AT&T with roaming SIM
item.dc:creator: cbrake
item.description:
is there an estimate when Verizon approvals will be complete?
